question: What is the protective efficacy of vaxchora against moderate to severe cholera?
ideal_answer: The protective efficacy of vaxchora  against moderate to severe cholera is 80-100%.

snippets.text: The oral live cholera vaccine CVD 103-HgR (Orochol, Mutachol), the first genetically modified organism (GMO) used as vaccine, was in its time (launched 1993, Switzerland) the ideal cholera vaccine: single-dose, protective efficacy of 80-100% against moderate to severe cholera, acting within 8 days and exhibiting excellent safety, indiscernible from placebo.
